data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anker, Arthur, Pachelle, Paulo P. G. (2019): Alpheus perlas, sp. nov., a new infaunal snapping shrimp from the Pacific coast of Panama (Malacostraca: Decapoda: Alpheidae). Zootaxa 4651 (1): 75-84, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4651.1.5|1 occurrence
